meanings.definition: Covered or marked with small spots or specks.
meanings.sent1: The ladybug had a specked shell.
meanings.sent2: The dalmatian had a specked coat.
meanings.sent3: The specked egg looked like a tiny work of art.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was specked with twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The specked butterfly fluttered gracefully in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The specked bird had colorful feathers.
meanings.sent2: The granite countertop was specked with shiny minerals.
meanings.sent3: The specked cat looked like it had been playing in paint.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was specked with tiny drops of rain.
meanings.sent5: The specked seashell glistened in the sunlight.
